name: Leawood
description: Leawood is one of Kansas City's most affluent suburbs, known for its excellent schools, upscale shopping at Town Center Plaza, and beautiful residential neighborhoods.
climate: Leawood experiences all four seasons with hot, humid summers and cold winters. The area is prone to severe thunderstorms and occasional hail, making quality roofing essential.

name: Overland Park
description: Overland Park is Kansas City's second-largest city and offers a perfect blend of suburban comfort with urban amenities, excellent schools, and thriving business districts.
commonIssues: Storm damage from tornadoes and hail
climate: Overland Park's continental climate brings temperature extremes and frequent severe weather, requiring durable roofing materials and proper installation.

name: Prairie Village
description: Prairie Village is a charming, tree-lined community with mid-century homes, walkable neighborhoods, and a strong sense of community pride.
climate: The mature tree canopy in Prairie Village provides shade but can contribute to moisture retention and organic growth on roofs.

name: Mission Hills
description: Mission Hills is Kansas City's premier luxury community, featuring stunning estates, rolling hills, and some of the metro's most prestigious addresses.
commonIssues: Complex roof systems on custom homes
climate: High-end homes in Mission Hills often feature specialty roofing materials that require expert installation and maintenance.

name: Lenexa
description: Lenexa has transformed from a small town to a thriving suburb with award-winning parks, a growing business sector, and diverse housing options.
climate: Lenexa's newer subdivisions feature modern roofing systems, but quality installation is crucial for long-term performance.

name: Olathe
description: Olathe is one of the fastest-growing cities in Kansas, offering excellent schools, abundant recreational opportunities, and a thriving downtown.
climate: Olathe's location makes it vulnerable to severe weather, including tornadoes and large hail.

name: Lee's Summit
description: Lee's Summit is one of Kansas City's largest and most desirable suburbs, known for its excellent schools, historic downtown, and family-friendly amenities.
climate: Lee's Summit experiences the full range of Midwest weather, with hot, humid summers and cold winters. Severe storms are common during spring and early summer.

name: Liberty
description: Liberty is a thriving community north of Kansas City with a rich history, excellent schools, and a perfect blend of small-town charm and modern convenience.
commonIssues: Storm damage from tornadoes and hail
climate: Located north of Kansas City, Liberty experiences severe weather including tornadoes, hail, and damaging winds. Quality roofing is essential for property protection.

name: Kansas City
description: Kansas City, Missouri is the heart of the metro area, featuring diverse neighborhoods from historic districts to modern developments, world-class amenities, and a thriving cultural scene.
climate: As the metro's urban center, Kansas City experiences the full force of Midwest weather patterns, with frequent severe storms, temperature extremes, and occasional ice storms.
